title: Unknown Errors
body:
These things are betting bloody annoying, every time I try to open a queue I get spammed for ages until I can finally get the button after like 15 clicks, then its constant Unknown Errors during the queue and I cant click accept because they won't go away, I have restarted, reinstalled and it still wont go. Does it even send reports? shouldn't about 75-150 "unknown Errors" from one person in 10 min be enough to catch the eye?

Took like 15 tries to get the accept button (break between every 5 so not to get wait).
